attributes.name: BuildURLMixin

methods.description:
Builds a URL for a given type and optional ID.

By default, it pluralizes the type's name (for example, 'post'
becomes 'posts' and 'person' becomes 'people'). To override the
pluralization see [pathForType](BuildUrlMixin/methods/pathForType?anchor=pathForType).

If an ID is specified, it adds the ID to the path generated
for the type, separated by a `/`.

When called by `RESTAdapter.findMany()` the `id` and `snapshot` parameters
will be arrays of ids and snapshots.
methods.name: buildURL

params.name: id
params.description: single id or array of ids or query

params.name: snapshot
params.description: single snapshot or array of snapshots

params.name: query
params.description: object of query parameters to send for query requests.
